creator: joe.gainey@autotrader.com
text:
I would like to add the ability to use a pipe for the connector log file.  Has
anyone tried this, or is it just a bad idea?

This has been added, but only for the Apache 2 version of mod_jk 1.2.
Use of the APR routines required by Apache 2 made this easy and
portable.  This is currently in CVS and will be in the mod_jk 1.2.3 release.

Providing this for Apache 1.3 or other non apache web servers is
not as easy due to the pain of writing portable code.  If the APR
was required for these other web servers support for piped logs could
be added.

Eventually I would like to see all of mod_jk ported to use the APR.
